title: 2.6 Master Challenge 3
question:
Mr. Jake is running a rental car business. He checks whether a customer is eligible to rent a car as per the following eligibility criteria:
● The customer must be at least 20 years old.
● The customer should have a driver’s license.
● The customer should have a sufficient bank balance to pay the rent.
Write a program to check the eligibility of the customer. Write the equivalent boolean expression too.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
